general.name: Filter Mask
general.notes: Never affected by gases or low oxygen levels

general.name: Medic Kit
general.notes: Spend an action to attend to any figure within 2”
general.completeNotes: Spend an action to attend to any figure within 2”, provided neither figure is in combat. This action may replace the move action. The recipient figure is immediately cured of any toxins, recovers from stun and is not longer treated as wounded. Has no effect on robots. There is no limit to how often this can be used.

general.name: Rapid Fire
general.notes: 2 Targets, -1 Move unless wearing heavy or combat armour

general.name: Flamethrower
general.notes: -1 Move unless wearing heavy or combat armour. Target Armour and cover modifiers

general.name: Combat Armour
general.notes: 50cr upkeep fee. Includes hand weapon, pistol and filter mask.

general.name: Shield
general.notes: May only carry weapons that take up less than 2 gear slot

advancedWeapons.name: Rapid Fire (2 Slots)
advancedWeapons.notes: 2 Targets, -1 Move unless wearing heavy or combat armour

advancedWeapons.name: Rapid Fire (+3 dmg)
advancedWeapons.notes: 2 Targets, -1 Move unless wearing heavy or combat armour

advancedWeapons.name: Flamethrower (+3 dmg)
advancedWeapons.notes: -1 Move unless wearing heavy or combat armour. Target Armour and cover modifiers

advancedTech.name: Advanced Deck
advancedTech.notes: +8 to unlock data-loot

advancedTech.name: Advanced Picks
advancedTech.notes: +8 to unlock  physical-loot

advancedTech.name: Integrated Filter Mask
advancedTech.notes: Never affected by gases or low oxygen levels

advancedTech.name: Nano-surgery Kit
advancedTech.notes: Like Medic Kit but additionally heals 1 HP
advancedTech.completeNotes: Spend an action to attend to any figure within 2”, provided neither figure is in combat. This action may replace the move action. The recipient figure is immediately cured of any toxins, recovers from stun and is not longer treated as wounded. Has no effect on robots. There is no limit to how often this can be used.

advancedTech.name: Light Energy Armour
advancedTech.notes: +1 Fight against Shooting attacks

advancedTech.name: Heavy Energy Armour
advancedTech.notes: -1 Move, +1 Fight against Shooting attacks

advancedTech.name: AWS Combat Armour
advancedTech.notes: 75cr upkeep fee. Includes hand weapon, shotgun and filter mask.

advancedTech.name: Energy Shield
advancedTech.notes: +1 Fight against Shooting attacks (does not stack with energy armour)

advancedTech.name: Combat Drugs (2)
advancedTech.notes: Cannot be used by robots. Figure gains +1 Fight (not above +6) -1 Will for the next game

advancedTech.name: Pain-masker
advancedTech.notes: Regain 4 Health. Takes up no gear slot if carried alongside a Medic Kit or Nano-Surgery Kit

advancedTech.name: Gravity Suppressor
advancedTech.notes: Never takes falling damage

advancedTech.name: Jump Pack
advancedTech.notes: Once per game, the wearer may make a move ignoring movement penalties for rough ground, climbing or carrying physical loot.

advancedTech.name: Improved Drone
advancedTech.notes: Once per game, if a figure in the crew activates the Drone power, their Drone has +1 Fight and +1 Move. If the drone is reduced to 0 Health, roll a D20. On 1-4 the device is destroyed.

advancedTech.name: Holographic Projector
advancedTech.notes: Wearer gains +1 to their Activation Roll for 'Holographic Wall'

advancedTech.name: Surge Battery
advancedTech.notes: Once per game, reduce the Strain of the 'Power Spike' power to 0.

advancedTech.name: Robot Repair Kit
advancedTech.notes: May spend one action to restore 2 Health to any Robot within 1” (both figures are not in combat!). Additionally when using the 'Repair Robot' power, it restores 6 Health (instead of 5)

advancedTech.name: Light Fragmentation Armour
advancedTech.notes: The figure gets +1 Armour against Fragmentation grenade attacks

advancedTech.name: Heavy Fragmentation Armour
advancedTech.notes: The figure gets +1 Armour against Fragmentation grenade attacks. -1 Move

advancedTech.name: Grapplewire
advancedTech.notes: Once per game, this figure may force combat with another figure within 3”.

advancedTech.name: Anti-toxin (2)
advancedTech.notes: The figure is cured of all toxins and poisons
advancedTech.completeNotes: Used as free action on self or used an action to attend to a figure within 1”. The figure is cured of all toxins and poisons.

advancedTech.name: Psychic Shield
advancedTech.notes: Immune to 'Suggestion' power.

advancedTech.name: Plasmablaster
advancedTech.notes: Once per game, the wearer may make a flamethrower attack.

advancedTech.name: Neural Chip
advancedTech.notes: Gain +1 Will.

advancedTech.name: Anti-Gravity Patch (3)
advancedTech.notes: Use on a physical-loot token within 1”. This token no longer causes movement penalties

advancedTech.name: Weapon Cage
advancedTech.notes: Attach to any weapon. It becomes indestructible.

advancedTech.name: Extended Magazine
advancedTech.notes: Does not suffer the Weapon Jam penalty for the first 1 rolled for a shooting attack per game.

advancedTech.name: Robot Antenna
advancedTech.notes: Once per game, add +1 to the activation roll of 'Remote Guidance' or 'Remote Firing'.

advancedTech.name: Jet Boots
advancedTech.notes: Once per game, the wearer may add +3 move for one activation or +10 to a move stat roll (may be made after the stat roll is made).

advancedTech.name: Gill Suit
advancedTech.notes: Gain the 'Amphibious' attribute

advancedTech.name: Liftgloves
advancedTech.notes: Add +8 to a Fight stat roll that has a target number (not a combat roll).

advancedTech.name: Hardsuit
advancedTech.notes: Only becomes stunned if takes 6 damage from shooting attacks instead of 4.

advancedTech.name: Pulse Disperser
advancedTech.notes: Once per game, for 'Electromagnetic Pulse' power reduce the Strain to 0.

advancedTech.name: Neutron Polarity Reverser
advancedTech.notes: May use 'Cancel Power' power even if it is not possessed by the character. Roll for activation as normal, using based activation number, adding the figures Will stat to the roll. May not Exert to use this power. On a natural 1, the device is destroyed.

advancedTech.name: Hotshift Pack
advancedTech.notes: Once per game, when making a shooting attack with a pistol, carbine or shotgun, the wearer may take two shots at two different targets (with one action). The weapon used with this ability cannot be fired again in the same game. On a shooting roll of 1, the device is destroyed.

advancedTech.name: Grapplegun
advancedTech.notes: Spend an action when standing next to a wall. Make a Shoot Roll (TN10). If successful, the figure immdediately climbs 8” straight up as a free action.

advancedTech.name: Robot Scrambler
advancedTech.notes: When winning a round of hand-to-hand combat with a robot, you may choose to not inflict damage, but use this device instead. The robot immediately makes Will Roll (TN20). If failed, the robot is removed as a casualty (but does not have to make a Survival Roll after the game).

advancedTech.name: Swiftsuit
advancedTech.notes: Gain +1 Move (may not take the figure above Move 7).

advancedTech.name: Ablative Armour Plates
advancedTech.notes: Absorbs the first 2 points of Damage this figure takes from external sources. After 2 points of Damage, this gear is destroyed.

advancedTech.name: Data Virus
advancedTech.notes: One use only (destroyed afterwards). Encrypt any data-token on the table. It now requires a Will Roll (TN26) to unlock.

advancedTech.name: Power Selector
advancedTech.notes: When making a shooting attack with a pistol, carbine or shotgun, the wearer may decide to gain -1 Shoot in order to gain +2 Damage. If activated, the device is destroyed a shoot roll of 1.

advancedTech.name: Pistol Belt
advancedTech.notes: The Figure may wear 2 Pistols at the same time using only one gear slot. Does not suffer the Weapon Jam penalty for the first 1 rolled for a Pistol shooting attack per game.

alienTech.name: Micro Transporter
alienTech.notes: Target figures for power 'Bait and Switch' must make a Will Roll (TN16) instead of (TN14) to resist.

alienTech.name: Pickcaster
alienTech.notes: Once per game, gain +2 on the activation roll for the 'Break Lock' power.

alienTech.name: Mindshackles
alienTech.notes: Once per game, target figures for power 'Animal Control' must make a Will Roll (TN22) instead of (TN16) to resist.

alienTech.name: Dark Energy Crystal
alienTech.notes: Reduce the Strain of the 'Dark Energy' power to 0.

alienTech.name: Data Worm
alienTech.notes: Once per game, reduce the Strain 'Data Jump', 'Data Knock' or 'Data Skip' to 0.

alienTech.name: Enhanced Energy Shield
alienTech.notes: For the first per game if the power 'Energy Shield' is activated, the shield absorbs 4 instead of 3 damage.

alienTech.name: Robolock
alienTech.notes: Once per game, target figures for power 'Control Robot' must make a Will Roll (TN22) instead of (TN15) to resist for the first roll. In subsequent turns, the roll is (TN15) again.

alienTech.name: Sensory Tendrils
alienTech.notes: Once per game, choose to either gain +2 on the activation roll for the 'Target Lock' power, or reduce its Strain to 0.

alienTech.name: Binding Talisman
alienTech.notes: Once per game, choose to either gain +2 on the activation roll for the 'Heal' power, or the power heals up to 7 lost points of Health.

alienTech.name: Psychic Resonator
alienTech.notes: Once per game, choose to either gain +2 on the activation roll for the 'Psychic Shield' power, or reduce its Strain to 1.

alienTech.name: Flicker Light
alienTech.notes: Once per game, choose to either gain +2 on the activation roll for the 'Quick Step' power, or reduce its Strain to 0.

alienTech.name: Mindspike
alienTech.notes: Once per game, after activating the 'Suggestion' power, you may increase the Will Roll to resist to (TN18).

alienTech.name: Phase Manipulator
alienTech.notes: Once per game, choose to either gain +2 on the activation roll for the 'Transport' power, or reduce its Strain to 0.

alienTech.name: Focalizing Crystal
alienTech.notes: Once per game, the wearer may activate the 'Void Blade' power without having to make an activation roll (no experience is gained thi way).

alienTech.name: Garkon Tick
alienTech.notes: Once per game, choose to either gain +2 on the activation roll for the 'Adrenalin Surge' power, or reduce its Strain to 1.

alienTech.name: Reality Distorter
alienTech.notes: Once per game, the wearer may attempt the 'Cancel Power' power as a free action.

alienTech.name: Razor Derringer
alienTech.notes: Once per game, choose to either gain +2 on the activation roll for the 'Concealed Firearm' power, or increase the attack generated to +6.

alienTech.name: Hearthrike
alienTech.notes: Does not suffer Armour Interference penalties while wearing light armour.

alienTech.name: Blessed Horthath
alienTech.notes: Once per game, gain +2 on the activation roll for the 'Fortune' power.

alienTech.name: Cursed Idress
alienTech.notes: Once per game, choose to either gain +2 on the activation roll for the 'Puppet Master' power, or reduce its Strain to 1.
